LanguageData.Rakkle_ColonyKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an ordinary kid from anywhere who grew up in any free rakkle settlement.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Student.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a school-trained rakkle. [PAWN_pronoun] made friends at school and learned how to survive in the periphery.
LanguageData.Rakkle_EmergencyFood.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a young rakkle kidnapped by a cannibal tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] spent scary days watching other friends disappear one by one. [PAWN_pronoun] escaped through a tunnel secretly dug, but the wound still lingers on [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.Rakkle_GiftedChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was recognized as a gifted child and received a high level of education.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Bully.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the children's alley leader in a free rakkle settlement.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Subject.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up as an experiment in a lab from a very young age. After a hard experiment, [PAWN_pronoun] eventually lost human's mind.
LanguageData.Rakkle_HunterAssistant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a famous hunter's assistant. Although still young, [PAWN_pronoun] has the ability to hunt.
LanguageData.Rakkle_BookWorm.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a great bookworm. For [PAWN_pronoun] the world is too rough, but the knowledge gained from the book will be of great help to [PAWN_pronoun]. In other words, [PAWN_pronoun] wants to be called a book snake rather than a bookworm.
LanguageData.Rakkle_ClothingStoreKid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child of a seamstress. The knowledge I learned over my loving mother's shoulder will help [PAWN_pronoun] to some extent.
LanguageData.Rakkle_ConstructionWorker.baseDescriptio: [PAWN_nameDef] is a young rakkle who is responsible for chores at the construction site. I don't usually do this when I was a kid, but [PAWN_pronoun] had a reason to do it.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Orphan.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an orphan who lived in a ruins outside a settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] also doesn't know why he doesn't have parents. What's important right now is to survive.
LanguageData.Rakkle_PrecociousChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has always been called an old child by adults. Adult [PAWN_pronoun] wants to help settlement.
LanguageData.Rakkle_CuriousChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a curious little boy. Curiosity causes a lot of problems, but this curiosity will help you a lot.
LanguageData.Rakkle_WildSnake.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rakkle that grew up alone in the wild. Life in the settlement is awkward for [PAWN_pronoun] who was found in the wild and joined the settlement.
LanguageData.Rakkle_SandboxGreat.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the best sand castle builder in the settlement. No one in the settlement will follow [PAWN_pronoun]'s sand castle.
LanguageData.Rakkle_PeePoo.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child who is interested in the body. [PAWN_pronoun] makes excuses not to pee every time.
LanguageData.Rakkle_AbandonedYoungSlave.baseDescripti: [PAWN_nameDef] was a slave to a human settlement. The settlement wasn't part of the cradle, but he liked to bully [PAWN_pronoun] into slavery.
LanguageData.Rakkle_IdolTrainee.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child who wants to become an idol someday. The story of an adult star idol was enough to fascinate [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.Rakkle_LittleGlutton.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] meat is a great eater. [PAWN_pronoun] studied cooking to eat meat more deliciously. It's just raw meat.
LanguageData.Rakkle_PlantLover.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a slightly unusual rakkle. They are not interested in plants because Rakkle is a carnivore. But [PAWN_pronoun] is very interested in the crops that trees and humans eat.
LanguageData.CRD_YoungGoods.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the products managed by the cradle. [PAWN_pronoun] is still young, but [PAWN_pronoun] is waiting for a day to serve humans soon.
LanguageData.CRD_CradleLeaderChild.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a child of the cot leadership. [PAWN_pronoun] will grow up to be a member of the leadership class, not a product.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Blacksmith.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a blacksmith. The rakkle is friendly to other tribes, but in order to survive in the periphery, they also had to produce weapons.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Butcher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an employee of a settlement butcher. Cooking doesn't mean much to Rakkle, but slaughtering is one of the most important things.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Seamstress.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] ran a clothing store. The clothes [PAWN_pronoun] made were very popular.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Rancher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rakkle that used to raise livestock on a large ranch. Livestock is a very important resource for rakkle, a carnivore.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Guard.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the rakkle that kept the settlement safe. [PAWN_pronoun] will do its best to protect the settlers from the cradle.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Hunter.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a hunter responsible for supplying meat to the settlement. Hunters are very important and indispensable jobs for rakkle who can't eat crops.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Architect.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rakkle that studies construction techniques to repair and expand settlements. To withstand the attack from the cradle, we need to build a stronger fortress.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Avenger.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rakkle who lost family after being attacked by a cradle in the past. [PAWN_pronoun] continues to train to avenge them.
LanguageData.Rakkle_CannibalSnake.baseDescription: Rakkle is usually friendly to the heterogeneous and doesn't eat, but there are exceptions. [PAWN_nameDef] was a member of the small rakkle tribe. [PAWN_pronoun] from the tribe still hasn't forgotten the taste of human flesh.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Farmer.baseDescription: In the past, rakkle settlements did not farm. But now, many farmer rakkles have been created to interact with ethnic groups. [PAWN_nameDef] is more talented in farming than other rakkles. I'm still immature for the mixed race.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Diplomat.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] visits friendly settlements around the rakkle settlements and interacts. Rakkle, who has to interact with ethnic groups, continues to foster diplomats.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Lazy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a great slut. [PAWN_pronoun] hates to work the most.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Idol.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a famous in-planetary idol. In Rimworld, the demand for idols is not high, but we can cheer up because we have fans who like them. [PAWN_pronoun] dreams of becoming a star idol someday.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Model.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a model rakkle with beautiful beauty and body.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Teacher.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the teacher responsible for the children in the settlement. A gentle-tempered [PAWN_pronoun] is a popular teacher for children.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Professor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professor in charge of research in settlements. [PAWN_pronoun] also plays a role in educating other settlers, but [PAWN_pronoun] feels more comfortable studying.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Miner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a miner. It is said that primitive rakkles had a habit of digging into the ground and living. [PAWN_pronoun] says the cradle is mined thinking about the primitive rakkle that has been wiped out.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Merchant.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loves money. [PAWN_pronoun] is thinking about how to sell and buy more cheaply, both at night and at night.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Gunner.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has a talent for shooting. [PAWN_pronoun] says playing with a slingshot from an early age was helpful.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Storyteller.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a rakkle that tells children funny stories. If there is a TV in a settlement, it is popular with children in a settlement that does not.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Fool.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an idiot. [PAWN_pronoun] don't really think about anything and just live as it goes.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Doctor.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the 'doctor' of the settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] decided to become a doctor after seeing the number of injuries increased due to frequent raids. And now many people in the settlements rely on [PAWN_pronoun].
LanguageData.Rakkle_OrphanageDirector.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the head of an orphanage that takes care of orphans in a settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] wants children to stop suffering.
LanguageData.Rakkle_Artist.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an artistic-talented racle. [PAWN_pronoun] who feels rewarding for other settlers to look after his art will continue to make art for the settlers.
LanguageData.Rakkle_EscapedGoods.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is one of the items that escaped from the cradle. The mentally insensitive [PAWN_pronoun] didn't get brainwashed and witnessed what happened to his sold friends. On the day that [PAWN_pronoun] was sold, a group of mechanoid fell at the cot stop and [PAWN_pronoun] took advantage of it and ran away.
LanguageData.CDR_Toy.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product raised by human toys. [PAWN_pronoun] has been trained in various things that make human beings happy.
LanguageData.CDR_Maid.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product raised as a maid for the upper class of humans. [PAWN_pronoun] was trained in housework.
LanguageData.CDR_Livestock.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product raised to produce livestock products for humans. [PAWN_pronoun] will be sold elsewhere depending on its purpose. Maybe they'll be slaughtered as soon as they're sold.
LanguageData.CDR_Workman.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product developed to be involved in various tasks in human society. [PAWN_pronoun] will do its best for the human race.
LanguageData.CDR_Slave.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is simply a slave product. This product is inferior to other products. [PAWN_pronoun] will be used like a consumable.
LanguageData.CDR_FightingSnake.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a fighter's prize in a fight snake contest. Although rakkle is not very aggressive, fighting snakes like [PAWN_pronoun] have been taught to fight from an early age.
LanguageData.CDR_Breeder.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product raised to produce another rakkle. This product is sold only to special trim customers. [PAWN_pronoun] will continue to give birth for your master until it is useless.
LanguageData.CDR_serf.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a product trained to work in the fields. The rakkle is a carnivore, but [PAWN_pronoun] will plough the field hard for his master.
LanguageData.CDR_Attacker.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a product label managed by the cradle. Recognizing the combat talent of [PAWN_pronoun] the cradle fostered [PAWN_pronoun] as a combatant.
LanguageData.CDR_Elite.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is an elite who has been professionally trained since childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] will destroy all enemies for the cradle settlement.
LanguageData.CDR_Captured.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a free rakkle in a settlement. One day a cradle's rakkle recovery unit came into [PAWN_pronoun]'s settlement, and all the rakkles were taken away except for the rakkles that were resisting. [PAWN_pronoun] is no more than or less than the meat shield of the cradle.
LanguageData.CDR_Leader.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is the leader of the Cradle settlement. [PAWN_pronoun] has had professional education and training since childhood. [PAWN_pronoun] will keep this comfortable life going for their own children.
